content:
I want to volunteer in Kamal‚Äôs campaign. I was thinking of helping with setting up the headquarters in Delaware Valley, the campaign rallies, and welcoming guests. I do not feel comfortable texting or calling people.
Does anyone have any ideas?
I'm not sure where Delaware Valley is, perhaps the Delaware County Dems office can connect you with opportunities. https://www.delcodems.com/take-action/volunteer/
Not a mod but I live here. Delaware Valley does not refer to Delco

‚ÄúIn addition to Philadelphia, other major population centers in the Delaware Valley include Reading, Upper Darby Township, and Chester in Pennsylvania; Atlantic City, Camden, Vineland, and Cherry Hill in South Jersey; and Wilmington and Dover in Delaware.‚Äù
It includes Delco as well as ChesCo, MontCo Philadelphia, and Bucks County

Thanks to Gabby I know more about Pennsylvania. 
If you go to https://www.mobilize.us/padems/ it will show events near you, you can also filter with a specific zipcode and/or location and filter by keywords for events like "rally" and "canvass"

I grew up near Philadelphia. My sister and her husband live in North Wales and I will be canvassing near them in September 
I have lived in VA for many years. Today I did phone banking in VA for PA. 
I easily connected with the voters- probably just luck. 
Am I allowed to sign up to do phone banks in PA despite living in VA? 
Thanks very much!! üòäüíô
Hi Joy, you can sign up to phonebank in PA from anywhere. If you phonebank with the team here, it will be to swing states.
